mapper.select: select from TGRID_BUILD_INFO ORDER by BUILD_ORDER_NUM DESC
select from TGRID_BUILD_INFO ORDER by BUILD_ORDER_NUM ASC
select case when max(BUILD_ORDER_NUM) is null then 1 else max(BUILD_ORDER_NUM)+1 end ORDERNUM from TGRID_BUILD_INFO

select * from TGRID_BUILD_INFO where BUILD_ORDER_NUM = (select max(BUILD_ORDER_NUM) from TGRID_BUILD_INFO where BUILD_ORDER_NUM<(select BUILD_ORDER_NUM from TGRID_BUILD_INFO where BUILD_ID=#{Id,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}))

select * from TGRID_BUILD_INFO where BUILD_ORDER_NUM = (select min(BUILD_ORDER_NUM) from TGRID_BUILD_INFO where BUILD_ORDER_NUM>(select BUILD_ORDER_NUM from TGRID_BUILD_INFO where BUILD_ID=#{Id,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}))
select from TGRID_BUILD_INFO where BUILD_INPUT_UNIT_ID=#{organId} ORDER by BUILD_CODE DESC
select from TGRID_BUILD_INFO where BUILD_INPUT_USER_ID=#{userId} ORDER by BUILD_CODE DESC
